docs.text: Xorcery ¶ A Java library for making webservices. Every great journey begin with a single step. The source code can be found at GitHub and is distributed under the terms of Apache License 2.0 . Features ¶ Reactive streams over websockets Eventsourcing Service discovery using DNS and mTLS JSON:API Requires JRE 11 or higher Built with maven Extensive unit and integration tests Adheres to Semantic Versioning Quick Start ¶ Have a look at xorcery-examples for tips on how to create Xorcery projects. Contribute ¶ Fork the Source code at GitHub . Feel free to send pull requests. Found a bug? File a bug report! License ¶ Xorcery is OpenSource software. The source code is distributed under the terms of Apache License 2.0 .
